snippet.title: The Scouring Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
The Scouring is an RTS with fast pace, high attention to detail and next generation experience that I've been working on for the last 3 or so years.

What started as a "quick break from Spintires/Mudrunner/Snowrunner" ended up as this! You can find more information here -
https://store.steampowered.com/app/3338950/The_Scouring

Lead humans or orcs in a Classic Mode or use one of powerful Heroes to fight for victory! Play alone or with friends. Use our modding tools to create maps and custom game modes! Join The Scouring!
